--welcome-1: This assistant will help you identify problems and suggest solutions about integration into Incomaker.
--welcome-2: Are you just starting the integration process? You will find step-by-step instructions in our integration manual.
--welcome-3: Are you implementing the XML feed on your own? For detailed information about our standard schema check XML feed documentation.
--api-key-hint: To obtain an API key, you must log into your account on my.incomaker.com and go to E‑shop Info tab.
